IIncomeReceivable.IncomeType","name":"incomeType","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"string","name":"description","type":"string"}],"name":"recordOffChainIncome","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"CapSign Inc.","details":"Records income received by entity wallets from their investments for tax reporting.      Supports funds (K-1), corporations (1120), trusts (1041), and other entities.      Income Sources:      - Claiming distributions from tokens the entity holds (dividends)      - Recording off-chain income (rental, royalties)      - Classifying direct transfers as income (airdrops, etc.)      This facet emits events that the subgraph indexes for tax reporting.      Design Notes:      - This facet handles income FLOWING INTO the entity      - AssetDisposalFacet handles assets LEAVING the entity      - TokenDistributionFacet handles returns TO entity members","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that was off-chain)","timestamp":"When the income was received/recorded","wallet":"The wallet receiving income (fund, corporate, trust, or individual)"}},"ReceiptClassified(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount received","incomeType":"Classification assigned","receivedAt":"Approximate timestamp of ID"},"returns":{"amount":"Claimable amount for this fund wallet"}},"getDistributionDetails(address,uint256)":{"params":{"distributionContract":"The distribution contract","distributionId":"The distribution ID"},"returns":{"cancelled":"Whether distribution was cancelled","expiresAt":"Expiration timestamp","paymentToken":"Token being distributed","totalAmount":"Total distribution claimExternalIncome(address,uint256,addr.details: Calls the distribution contract's claimDistribution function and emits income event

params.sourceAsset: The token that generated this income (for tracking)

classifyReceivedIncome(address,uint256,u.details: Used for direct transfers, airdrops, etc. that weren't claimed through claimExternalIncome

params.receivedAt: Approximate timestamp of receipt (for tax year determination)

returns.amount: Claimable amount for this fund wallet

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

recordOffChainIncome(address,address,uin.details: For income received outside the blockchain that needs tracking

params.amount: Amount received (in payment token decimals, or raw for fiat)
params.paymentToken: Token that was received (use address(0) for fiat)
params.sourceAsset: Address representing the income source (can be token or arbitrary ID)

claimExternalIncome(address,uint256,addr.notice: Claim a distribution from an external token and record as income

classifyReceivedIncome(address,uint256,u.notice: Classify a past token receipt as income

getClaimableIncome(address,uint256).notice: Preview claimable amount from a distribution

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes
